alert.note: Alert for Adams; Bowman; Grant; Hettinger; Sioux; Slope; Stark (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 21 at 10:49PM CST until December 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST/6 AM CST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST/NOON CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. * WHERE...Bowman, Slope, Adams, Hettinger, Stark, Sioux, and Grant counties. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 5 AM MST/6 AM CST/ Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, until 11 AM MST/Noon CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Travel will become very difficult to impossible. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Avoid outdoor activities as much as possible. When outside, be sure to wear appropriate winter apparel. Make frequent checks on older family, friends, and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Bowman; Grant; Hettinger; Sioux; Slope; Stark
